Title: That broken tech/content culture cycle
Description: Here’s how you do it. Build a platform which relies on cultural creation as its core value, but which only sees itself as a technology platform. Title: Finding your leadership style
Description: When it comes to career advice, a common recommendation is you’ll need to work on your leadership to become more senior. In previous times “leadership skills” may have been code for “become a manager”, but nowadays even in hands-on/individual contributor roles leadership skills are becoming increasingly sought after.

Title: CUPID—for joyful coding
Description: What started as lighthearted iconoclasm, poking at the bear of SOLID, has developed into something more concrete and tangible. If I do not think the SOLID principles are useful these days, then what would I replace them with? Can any set of principles hold for all software? What do we even mean by principles?

Title: My Django Journey - Caleb Cheptumo
Description: When you are in your twenties, especially when you are a technology enthusiast, you get plenty of advice, notable advice. it is problem solving, hence very helpful.
